text: John Ericksen (August 30, 1903 - October 17, 1985) was an American skier. He competed in the Nordic combined event at the 1932 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1903 births Category:1985 deaths Category:American male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of the United States Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1932 Winter Olympics Category:People from Arendal
title: John Ericksen
